content.rendered: Nese Akduman is a Criminology graduate and has been working in the education sector for almost 3 years. She is currently working as a student finance officer and her main responsibilities consist of providing up to date information about student finance, assisting students with their application process, as well as helping resolve any problems students may face during their studies in regards to their finance.
